borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of condition 2 and condition 3 of planning permission ref: 2021/02414/FUL granted 26th October 2021. Amendments to include alterations to the front lightwell window and rendering of the front facade at lower ground floor level, alterations to the rear and side doors of lower ground floor extension, alterations to the rear and side facade of single storey back addition to include installation of timber cladding, alterations to the size of 1no. window at first and second floor level, and 1no. window covering lower ground and upper ground floor level to the rear elevation, rendering and external wall insulation to the side and rear facade of the building, alterations to the size of 1no. window, and retention of 1no. existing window to the side elevation at first floor level, re-positioning of 1no. window to the side elevation at upper ground floor level, omission of 1no. window, and alterations to 2no. windows to the side elevation at lower ground floor level, alterations to size of rooflight in side roofslope (amended description).
